summary: This document contains the Articles of Incorporation for a corporation named MORT, INC. established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the corporation's purposes, powers, and the names of the individuals forming the corporation, including their addresses.

persons.name: William S. McConnell
persons.context: William S. McConnell is one of the incorporators of MORT, INC., as indicated in the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Denise J. Richards
persons.context: Denise J. Richards is listed as an incorporator of MORT, INC.

persons.name: Michelle Connor
persons.context: Michelle Connor is also named as an incorporator of MORT, INC.

persons.name: George F.L.T. Dudley
persons.context: George F.L.T. Dudley is identified as the resident agent for MORT, INC.

keyFacts: The corporation MORT, INC. was established for various lawful business purposes.
The total number of shares authorized for the corporation is 1,000 shares of common stock.
The minimum capital required to commence business is $1,000.
The document was acknowledged on April 12, 2011, by the incorporators.
George F.L.T. Dudley is designated as the resident agent for the corporation.
